content: glue until it turns from thick paste into white-ish liquid like diluted milk lay out the star on the plastic wrap-covered cardboard use a paintbrush to apply the glue solution the star should keep the perfect form use pins to fix it to the cardboard until the glue starch sets my stars stayed put without any pins let it dry completely before removing it from the cardboard a free pattern by
